text:
e="preserve">Jean-Yves Nau (28 May 1952 – 8 November 2020) was a French physician and scientific journalist. He began working for the newspaper "Le Monde" in 1980. He wrote for "La Revue du practicien", "Revue Médicale Suisse", "La Nouvelle République du Centre-Ouest".
He moved to the French language version of "Slate magazine" as a columnist.
Nau died on 8 November 2020 at the age of 68.
